name: Army of Pixels (itch)
description:
1.1 UPDATE: A much-needed campaign mode was added, that is actually interesting. Also it features a bare-bones ingame tutorial, bugfixes and polish.

An indie game where you strategically place your armies in order to gain the upper hand. Combine the 9 factions to create the ultimate army! Use spells tactically to change the tide of war.

Army of pixels features
- effect-rich, charming pixel art
- turn-based combat combined with real-time elements
- unique gameplay where unit placement and counter-units are the key to victory
- 9 factions to unlock, be it vampires, zombies, angels or demons, each with its unique spell
- choose any 3 of the factions to use them combined
- completely free to play!

We would be happy to any feedback, and a like at our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/armyofpixels
